sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 369,769 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 165,878.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 642,470 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Your healing and damage periodic spells grant 191 Intellect each time they heal or deal damage. Lasts 15 sec, stacking up to 20 times.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
